name: Taking Shape
description:
Taking Shape is a multi-user virtual reality experience. Explore an abstract "Bauhaus" inspired environment with a friend or on your own. You can mess around and experiment with the physics of various three-dimensional shapes throughout the map. Navigate your surroundings, and see what this strange, geometric world entails.

This game is played using mouse and keyboard controls. Use WASD to move and left click to manipulate small objects.
